                throws IOException,
                       ClassNotFoundException,
                       IllegalAccessException,
                       IllegalArgumentException,

      • generateOutput

        public static void generateOutput(DataModel<Long,Long> testModel,
                  File userRecommendationFile,
                  EvaluationStrategy<Long,Long> strategy,
                  EvaluationStrategy.OUTPUT_FORMAT format,
                  File rankingFolder,
                  File groundtruthFolder,
                  String inputFileName,
                  String strategyClassSimpleName,
                  String threshold,
                  String suffix,
                  Boolean overwrite)
                           throws FileNotFoundException,
                                  IOException
        Runs a particular strategy on some data and outputs the result into a file.
        Parameters:
        testModel - The test datamodel.
        userRecommendationFile - The file that contains the recommendations for users.
        strategy - The strategy to use.
        format - The format of the printer
        rankingFolder - Where to write output.
        groundtruthFolder - Where to read test set.
        inputFileName - The file names to read.
        strategyClassSimpleName - The class name of the strategy.
        threshold - The relevance threshold.
        suffix - The file suffix.
        overwrite - Whether or not to overwrite the results file.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if file does not exist.
        IOException - when
